Title: A Weekend in the Country
Plot: Joey's friends and their families work together to make sure that the opening of Potter's Bed & Breakfast is a success and that she and Bessie don't lose everything they have after Pacey surprises them with a visit from a prestigious travel critic. Throughout the weekend, Jen admits her concerns to Grams about getting close to Henry; Jack considers moving back home after hearing Andie's loving plea; and Dawson tries to understand the connection between his parents even after their divorce.
GuestStars: Carl McIntyre, Kelly Jones Gabriele, Jeffrey Stepakoff, L.M. Wells
